headline: Vaccine Stocks Fall Following Report of Plans to Link Covid Shot With Child Deaths
summary: Shares of vaccine companies fell after a report that federal officials plan to link Covid-19 vaccines with child deaths.  Pfizer shares declined 4%, Novavax shares fell 3.6%, Moderna shares were down 7.4% and BioNTech shares closed 7.3% lower.  The Washington Post reported Friday that federal health officials plan to link the vaccines to the deaths of 25 children during a presentation next week to advisers to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

headline: Sept. consumer sentiment falls, Moderna & COVID report, Gemini IPO
summary: Yahoo Finance's John Hyland tracks Friday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Consumer sentiment for September fell to its lowest level since May. Moderna (MRNA) stock is sinking on a Washington Post report that Trump administration health officials will link a number of deaths to COVID-19 vaccine shots. Gemini shares will reportedly open at $32, according to Bloomberg. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

Gemini shares will reportedly open at $32, according to Bloomberg. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Drugmakers Fall on Report US to Claim Covid Shots Killed Kids
summary: The Washington Post reported Friday that a group of health officials appear to have used the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System, or VAERS, to tie the deaths of 25 children to Covid vaccines.  A high-profile advisory committee that Kennedy revamped to include vaccine critics is scheduled to discuss the shots from companies including Pfizer Inc., Moderna Inc. and BioNTech SE at its meeting next week.  Covid vaccines have become a political flash point in recent weeks as conflict between Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and former CDC director Susan Monarez led to her ouster just weeks into her job.

raw.headline: Drugmakers Fall on Report US to Claim Covid Shots Killed Kids
raw.summary: The Washington Post reported Friday that a group of health officials appear to have used the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System, or VAERS, to tie the deaths of 25 children to Covid vaccines.  A high-profile advisory committee that Kennedy revamped to include vaccine critics is scheduled to discuss the shots from companies including Pfizer Inc., Moderna Inc. and BioNTech SE at its meeting next week.  Covid vaccines have become a political flash point in recent weeks as conflict between Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and former CDC director Susan Monarez led to her ouster just weeks into her job.

headline: Pfizer, Moderna, BioNTech trade lower amid report of vaccine link to child deaths
summary: Investing.com -- Vaccine makers’ stocks fell sharply midday Friday following reports from The Washington Post that Trump administration health officials are planning to link coronavirus vaccines to 25 children’s deaths.

headline: Trump officials to link child deaths to COVID shots, Washington Post reports
summary: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention staff routinely analyze VAERS and other safety monitoring data, the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services said in an emailed response.  Trump health officials plan to include the pediatric deaths claim in a presentation next week to an expert panel of advisers to the CDC that is considering new COVID vaccine recommendations, the report added.

Trump health officials plan to include the pediatric deaths claim in a presentation next week to an expert panel of advisers to the CDC that is considering new COVID vaccine recommendations, the report added.

headline: Pfizer Is Growing More Reliant on Vaccines as Controversies Swirl
summary: For U.S. Big Pharma companies, vaccines have largely been an afterthought. But by 2030, they could be a quarter of Pfizer’s revenue.
